name: dmphub-ui-kit
description: The toolkit for the dmphub-ui repository

scripts.copy-install: echo $(tput setaf 4)Copying fractal, gulp, and package.json files to dmphub-ui repo $(tput sgr 0) ... && cp -prv browserslist-stats.json fractal_subtheme fractal.js gulpfile.js package-lock.json package.json postcss.config.js sass-lint-config.yml ../dmphub-ui/ && echo $(tput setaf 4)Moving over to dmphub-ui repo $(tput sgr 0) ... && cd ../dmphub-ui/ && echo $(tput setaf 4)Installing node packages within dmphub-ui repo $(tput sgr 0) ... && npm install && echo $(tput setaf 4)Moving back to dmphub-ui-kit repo $(tput sgr 0) ... && cd ../dmphub-ui-kit/ && echo $(tput setaf 4)All done.$(tput sgr 0)
